channel.title: Posts on Emma's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Emma's Blog

item.title: Migrating away from Medium
item.description: Medium has gone downhill sharply since I first published some blogs on their platform. It’s been irritating to me as a reader of other blogs to be pushed to login or subscribe or whatever, and I don’t want my content used like that. So, I’ve finally sorted out my own blog - using Hugo & GitHub Pages Farewell, Medium.
